trans-unit.source: Helps to secure another implementation of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> by wrapping the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> object and restricting the resources that the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> has access to.
trans-unit.target: Ajuda a proteger outra implementação de <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> encapsulando o objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> e restringindo os recursos aos quais o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente tem acesso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class is the default resolver for all classes in the <xref:System.Xml> namespace.
trans-unit.target: A classe de <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> é o resolvedor padrão para todas as classes no namespace de <xref:System.Xml> .

trans-unit.source: It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives.
trans-unit.target: Ele é usado para carregar documentos XML e para resolver a recursos externos, como entidades, DTDs ou esquemas e as diretivas de inclusão.

trans-unit.source: You can override this default by specifying the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> object to use.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir esse padrão, especificando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> objeto a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> can access, you can use an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser restringir os recursos que subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> pode acessar, você pode usar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> wraps around a concrete implementation of <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> and restricts the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> has access to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> envolve uma implementação concreta de <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> e restringe os recursos que subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> tem acesso.

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> tem a capacidade para proibir o redirecionamento de domínio cruzado, que ocorre de uma referência de identificador de recurso uniforme (URI) inserido.

trans-unit.source: When you construct an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object, you provide a valid <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> to determine security.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> do objeto, você fornece uma opção válida <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> implementação junto com uma URL, uma instância de um objeto de evidência ou um conjunto de permissões, que é usada pelo <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> para determinar a segurança.

trans-unit.source: Either a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> is generated or the existing one is used and <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called on it to help secure the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer um <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=nameWithType> é gerado ou um existente é usado e <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é chamado para ajudar a proteger subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials.
trans-unit.target: os objetos de<xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> podem conter informações sigilosas como credenciais do usuário.

trans-unit.source: You should be careful when caching <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objects and should not pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object to an untrusted component.
trans-unit.target: Você deve ter cuidado ao armazenar em cache <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objetos e não deve transmitir o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objeto para um componente não confiável.

trans-unit.source: There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: Há diferenças na infraestrutura de segurança para o código em execução no .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) e de código em execução no CLR que é integrado no Microsoft SQL Server 2005.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode levar a casos em que o código desenvolvido para o .NET Framework CLR funciona de modo diferente quando usados no SQL Server integrado CLR.

trans-unit.source: One of these differences affects the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: Uma dessas diferenças afeta o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> classe quando você tiver evidências de que se baseia em uma URL (ou seja, quando você usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29> método ou o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> construtor).

trans-unit.source: The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> information.
trans-unit.target: A política de resolução integrada ao mecanismo do SQL Server CLR não usa o <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> ou <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> informações.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, ele concede permissões com base no GUID que o servidor adiciona quando os assemblies são carregados.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> no SQL Server integrado CLR, forneça as evidências necessárias diretamente por meio de um <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.

trans-unit.source: To use a secure resolver
trans-unit.target: Para usar um resolvedor seguro

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Crie <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> com o conjunto de permissões correto.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object that uses the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object.
trans-unit.target: Crie um objeto de <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> que usa o objeto de <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> .

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method when you're creating the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Passar o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> o objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> método quando você estiver criando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objeto.

trans-unit.source: To restrict access by using a URL
trans-unit.target: Para restringir o acesso por meio de uma URL

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> construtor para criar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objeto que tem permissão para acessar seu site de intranet local apenas.

trans-unit.source: To restrict access by using a permission set
trans-unit.target: Para restringir o acesso por meio de um conjunto de permissões

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> object.
trans-unit.target: Crie um objeto <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>.

trans-unit.source: Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as URLs que você deseja permitir o acesso ao.

trans-unit.source: Add the web permissions to the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Adicione as permissões da Web para o objeto de <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> .

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> constructor to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object by using the permission set.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> construtor para criar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objeto usando o conjunto de permissões.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> reference page for another example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> página de referência para obter outro exemplo.

trans-unit.source: To restrict access by using evidence
trans-unit.target: Para restringir o acesso por meio de evidência

trans-unit.source: You can restrict access by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> constructor and specifying <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode restringir o acesso por meio de <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> construtor e especificando <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> is used to create the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that is applied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> é usado para criar <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> que é aplicado a <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A> on the created <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> before opening any resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> chama <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A> em <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> criado antes de abrir qualquer recurso.

trans-unit.source: Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each:
trans-unit.target: Aqui estão alguns cenários comuns e o tipo de evidência para fornecer para cada um:

trans-unit.source: If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence:
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente totalmente confiável, use seu conjunto para criar a evidência:

trans-unit.source: If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence:
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente de confiança parcial, você tiver um código ou dados provenientes de uma fonte externa e você sabe a origem da origem externa e tem um URI verificável, use o URI para criar a evidência:

trans-unit.source: If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either:
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente de confiança parcial e você tiver um código ou dados provenientes de uma fonte externa, mas você não sabe a origem da fonte externa, ou:

trans-unit.source: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Defina o parâmetro de `evidence` a `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: Isso não permite sem acesso a recursos.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo requer algum acesso aos recursos, solicite a evidência do chamador.

trans-unit.source: To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet
trans-unit.target: Para usar o resolvedor seguro para carregar uma folha de estilos XSLT

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Crie <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> com o conjunto de permissões correto.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Passar <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> para o método de <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> .

trans-unit.source: This class has an inheritance demand.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe tem uma demanda de herança.

trans-unit.source: Full trust is required to inherit from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Confiança total é necessária para herdam o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" />.

trans-unit.source: The three constructors provide three types of access restrictions:
trans-unit.target: Os três construtores fornecem três tipos de restrições de acesso:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor restricts access by using a URL.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> construtor restringe o acesso por meio de uma URL.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> constructor restricts access by using a permission set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> construtor restringe o acesso por meio de um conjunto de permissões.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> constructor restricts access by using evidence.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> construtor restringe o acesso por meio de evidência.

trans-unit.source: See the constructor reference topics for examples of these types of restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Consulte os tópicos de referência de construtor para obter exemplos desses tipos de restrições.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O resolvedor XML que é encapsulado pelo <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" />.

trans-unit.source: The permission set to apply to the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de permissões a ser aplicado ao <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> calls the <see cref="M:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly" /> method on the permission set before calling the <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity(System.Uri,System.String,System.Type)" /> method on the underlying XML resolver.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> chama o método <see cref="M:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly" /> na permissão definida antes de chamar o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity(System.Uri,System.String,System.Type)" /> no resolvedor XML subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> class with the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> and <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> e <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The following example constructs an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object by using a customized permission set.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir constrói um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objeto usando um conjunto de permissões personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O resolvedor XML que é encapsulado pelo <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" />.

trans-unit.source: The evidence used to create the <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> that will be applied to the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: A evidência a ser usada para criar o <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> que será aplicado ao <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> calls the <see cref="M:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly" /> method on the created <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> before calling <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity(System.Uri,System.String,System.Type)" /> on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> chama o método <see cref="M:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly" /> criado <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> antes de chamar <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity(System.Uri,System.String,System.Type)" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> class with the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> and <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> e <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario:
trans-unit.target: Aqui estão alguns cenários possíveis e o tipo de evidência para fornecer para cada cenário:

trans-unit.source: If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence:
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente totalmente confiável, use seu conjunto para criar a evidência:

trans-unit.source: If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence:
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente de confiança parcial, você tiver um código ou dados provenientes de uma fonte externa e você sabe a origem da origem externa e tem um URI verificável, use o URI para criar a evidência:

trans-unit.source: If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either:
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente de confiança parcial e você tiver um código ou dados provenientes de uma fonte externa, mas você não sabe a origem da fonte externa, ou:

trans-unit.source: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Defina o parâmetro de `evidence` a `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: Isso não permite sem acesso a recursos.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo requer algum acesso aos recursos, solicite a evidência do chamador.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O resolvedor XML que é encapsulado pelo <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" />.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> that will be applied to the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: A URL usada para criar o <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> que será aplicado ao <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> calls <see cref="M:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly" /> on the created <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> before calling <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity(System.Uri,System.String,System.Type)" /> on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> chama <see cref="M:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly" /> no <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> criado antes de chamar <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity(System.Uri,System.String,System.Type)" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> class with the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> and URL provided.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> com o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> e a URL fornecida.

trans-unit.source: There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: Há diferenças na infraestrutura de segurança para o código em execução no .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) e de código em execução no CLR que é integrado no Microsoft SQL Server 2005.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode levar a casos em que o código desenvolvido para o .NET Framework CLR funciona de modo diferente quando usados no SQL Server integrado CLR.

trans-unit.source: One of these differences affects the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%2A> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor).
trans-unit.target: Uma dessas diferenças afeta o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> classe quando você tiver evidências de que se baseia em uma URL (ou seja, quando você usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%2A> método ou o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> construtor).

trans-unit.source: The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> information.
trans-unit.target: A política de resolução integrada ao mecanismo do SQL Server CLR não usa o <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> ou <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> informações.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, ele concede permissões com base no GUID que o servidor adiciona quando os assemblies são carregados.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> no SQL Server integrado CLR, forneça as evidências necessárias diretamente por meio de um <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.

trans-unit.source: This example uses the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> construtor para criar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> objeto que tem permissão para acessar seu site de intranet local apenas.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the evidence.
trans-unit.target: A URL usada para criar a evidência.

trans-unit.source: Creates evidence using the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Cria a evidência usando a URL fornecida.

trans-unit.source: The evidence generated from the supplied URL as defined by the default policy.
trans-unit.target: A evidência gerada da URL fornecida, conforme definida pela política padrão.

trans-unit.source: There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: Há diferenças na infraestrutura de segurança para o código em execução no .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) e de código em execução no CLR que é integrado no Microsoft SQL Server 2005.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode levar a casos em que o código desenvolvido para o .NET Framework CLR funciona de modo diferente quando usados no SQL Server integrado CLR.

trans-unit.source: One of these differences affects the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%2A> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor).
trans-unit.target: Uma dessas diferenças afeta o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> classe quando você tiver evidências de que se baseia em uma URL (ou seja, quando você usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%2A> método ou o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> construtor).

trans-unit.source: The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR doesn't use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> information.
trans-unit.target: A política de resolução integrada ao mecanismo do SQL Server CLR não usa o <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> ou <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> informações.

trans-unit.source: Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, ele concede permissões com base no GUID que o servidor adiciona quando os assemblies são carregados.

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> no SQL Server integrado CLR, forneça as evidências necessárias diretamente por meio de um <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.

trans-unit.source: Sets credentials used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Define as credenciais usadas para autenticar solicitações da Web.

trans-unit.source: The credentials to be used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais a serem usadas para autenticar solicitações da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> sets the given credentials on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> define as credenciais fornecidas no subjacente <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the value defaults to <see langword="null" />; that is, the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> has no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não estiver definida, o valor assumirá o padrão de <see langword="null" />, isto é, o <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver" /> não tem credenciais de usuário.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> with default credentials to resolve and open network resources needed by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir usa uma <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> com as credenciais padrão para resolver e abrir os recursos de rede necessários para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlTextReader>.

trans-unit.source: The URI that is returned from <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri(System.Uri,System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: O URI que é retornado de <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri(System.Uri,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: Não usado no momento.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: A versão atual retorna somente objetos <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: Maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Mapeia um URI para um objeto que contém o recurso real.

trans-unit.source: This method temporarily sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> created in the constructor by calling <see cref="M:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly" /> before calling <see langword="GetEntity" /> on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> to open the resource.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define temporariamente o <see cref="T:System.Security.PermissionSet" /> criado no construtor chamando <see cref="M:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly" /> antes de chamar <see langword="GetEntity" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente para abrir o recurso.

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <see langword="GetEntity" /> on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo retornado ao chamar <see langword="GetEntity" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> is specified, the method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se um tipo diferente de <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for especificado, o método retornará <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Your application can mitigate memory denial of service threats to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity%2A> method by implementing an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IStream> that limits the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Seu aplicativo pode reduzir a negação de memória de serviço para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity%2A> método implementando um <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IStream> que limita o número de bytes lidos.

trans-unit.source: This helps guard against situations where malicious code attempts to pass an infinite stream of bytes to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Isso ajuda a proteger contra a situações onde código mal-intencionado tenta transmitir um fluxo de infinito de bytes para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ofObjectToReturn" /> is neither <see langword="null" /> nor a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> type.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ofObjectToReturn" /> não é <see langword="null" /> nem um tipo <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: O URI especificado não é um URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="absoluteUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="absoluteUri" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
trans-unit.target: Há um erro de tempo de execução (por exemplo, uma conexão de servidor interrompida).

trans-unit.source: The URI returned from <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri(System.Uri,System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: O URI retornado de <see cref="M:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri(System.Uri,System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: Não usado no momento.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: A versão atual retorna somente objetos <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Mapeia de forma assíncrona um URI para um objeto que contém o recurso real.

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <see langword="GetEntity" /> on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo retornado ao chamar <see langword="GetEntity" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> is specified, the method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se um tipo diferente de <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for especificado, o método retornará <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The base URI used to resolve the relative URI.
trans-unit.target: O URI base usado para resolver o URI relativo.

trans-unit.source: The URI to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O URI a ser resolvido.

trans-unit.source: The URI can be absolute or relative.
trans-unit.target: O URI pode ser absoluto ou relativo.

trans-unit.source: If absolute, this value effectively replaces the <c>baseUri</c> value.
trans-unit.target: Se for absoluto, esse valor substitui o valor <c>baseUri</c> na prática.

trans-unit.source: If relative, it combines with the <c>baseUri</c> to make an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Se for relativo, ele combinará com o <c>baseUri</c> para tornar um URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: Resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs by calling <see langword="ResolveUri" /> on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />.
trans-unit.target: Resolve o URI absoluto dos URIs de base e relativo chamando <see langword="ResolveUri" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The absolute URI or <see langword="null" /> if the relative URI cannot be resolved (returned by calling <see langword="ResolveUri" /> on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />).
trans-unit.target: O URI absoluto ou <see langword="null" /> se não for possível resolver o URI relativo (retornado chamando <see langword="ResolveUri" /> no <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> subjacente).

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="relativeUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="relativeUri" /> é <see langword="null" />.
